Sentence.sentence: Morgan said those findings—which included data from the system's 13 community colleges, 27 technical colleges and six universities—were part of the decision not to move forward with Governor Bill Haslam's proposal to privatize management of state buildings in an effort to save money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And the reality is that antibiotics have been responsible for saving millions of lives since penicillin, one of the earliest antibiotics, was first used on a clinical basis 70 years ago.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: This proposal could save Medicare more than $100 billion over the next decade.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The final legislation might throw a public plan into the competition, but thanks to the fierce opposition of the insurance industry and Republican critics, it might not save much money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That statement comes not, as you might imagine, from a stereotypical tree-hugging, save-the-world greenie ( ' ,  环保主义者), but from Gordon Brown, a politician with a reputation for rigour, thoroughness and above all, caution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Standardization of forms for automatic processing will save a lot of medical expenses.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One boy said, I'd rather be concentrating on artistic efforts than saving the world or something.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It estimated that step would save hundreds of billions of dollars over the next decade.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Any doctor who has wrestled with multiple forms from different insurers, or patients who have tried to understand their own parade of statements, know that simplification ought to save money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They argue that governments should persuade us into making better decisions - such as saving more in our pension plans - by changing the default options.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Should doctors consider Medicare's budget in deciding what to use?I think ethically（在道德层面上） we are just worried about the patient in front of us and not trying to save money for the insurance industry or society as a whole, said Dr.Donald Jensen.Still
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Medicare could save hundreds of millions of dollars a year if everyone used the cheaper drug, Avastin, instead of the costlier one, Lucentis.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It will help to save money for society as a whole.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Cialdini conducted a study in San Diego in which coat hangers bearing messages about saving energy were hung on people's doors.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A roboticist at the Bristol Robotics Laboratory programmed a robot to save human proxies (替身) called H-bots from danger.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Banks can save a lot of money and avoid headaches by moving to a cash-free system, and they can also avoid bank robberies, theft, and dirty money.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: But when two H-bots became imperiled, the robot choked 42 percent of the time, unable to decide which to save and letting them both.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Even though Spooner screams "Save her! Save her!", the robot rescues him because it calculates that he has a 45 percent chance of survival compared to Sarah's 11 percent.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In the beginning of the movie I, Robot, a robot has to decide whom to save after two cars plunge into the water— Del Spooner or a child.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Morgan said those findings—which included data from the system's 13 community colleges, 27 technical colleges and six universities—were part of the decision not to move forward with Governor Bill Haslam's proposal to privatize management of state building
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Once purchased and trained, this would allow the casual user to save money and time, freeing up precious space in our busy lives to read a good book.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Robots already save us time, money and energy.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The experiment highlights the importance of morality: without it, how can a robot decide whom to save or what's best for humanity, especially if it can't calculate survival odds?
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Under the first law, a robot could not harm a dangerous gunman, but under the zeroth law, a robot could kill the gunman to save others.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"保存，储藏"之意。
means: maintain ： 指保持原样，不增不减
conserve ： 较正式用词，指小心地使用难以补充的资源或贵重物，免遭浪费或毁坏，以备不时之需。
preserve ： 侧重将物品完好无损地保存下来。
save ： 普通用词，指尽量少用，以争取数量上有所增加。
store ： 普通用词，指将物品存放，以备将来使用。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"营救，拯救，搭救"之意。
means: rescue ： 多指营救某人脱离紧迫的危险。
save ： 含义广泛，既可指营救某人使脱离危险，也可指精神或道德上的拯救。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =save,表示"救助"; 2. 完全的，安全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存款, 挽救, 救助
stems_affixes.word_buile: sav=save救助+ing状态→n.存款, 挽救, 救助
save救助→v.救,拯救;储蓄,贮存;节省

entry.def: If you save someone or something, you help them to avoid harm or to escape from a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

example.ex: ...a final attempt to save 40,000 jobs in Britain's troubled aero industry...
example.tran: 为保住陷入困境中的英国航空业的 4 万份工作所作的最后一次努力

example.ex: One man was still missing last night after the Belgian trawler Lucky capsized off the Dutch coast. Three other men were saved...
example.tran: 昨晚比利时拖网渔船“幸运号”在荷兰海岸附近沉没后，仍有1人失踪，其余 3 人被救起。

entry.def: If you save, you gradually collect money by spending less than you get, usually in order to buy something that you want.

example.ex: The majority of people intend to save, but find that by the end of the month there is nothing left...
example.tran: 大多数人都打算存钱，但月末时就会发现已一文不剩。

example.ex: Tim and Barbara are now saving for a house in the suburbs...
example.tran: 蒂姆和芭芭拉正在攒钱，准备在郊区买一栋房子。

entry.def: If you save something such as time or money, you prevent the loss or waste of it.

example.ex: It saves time in the kitchen to have things you use a lot within reach...
example.tran: 把厨房里常用的东西放在触手可及的地方能节省做饭时间。

example.ex: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles...
example.tran: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。

entry.def: If you save something, you keep it because it will be needed later.

example.ex: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup...
example.tran: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

example.ex: Scraps of material were saved, cut up and pieced together for quilts.
example.tran: 边角碎料都保留下来，剪好后拼在一起做成被子。

entry.def: If someone or something saves you from an unpleasant action or experience, they change the situation so that you do not have to do it or experience it.

example.ex: The scanner will save risk and pain for patients...
example.tran: 扫描仪将使病人免遭风险和痛苦。

example.ex: She was hoping that something might save her from having to make a decision...
example.tran: 她希望有什么能使自己不必作决定。

entry.def: If you save data in a computer, you give the computer an instruction to store the data on a tape or disk.

example.ex: Try to get into the habit of saving your work regularly...
example.tran: 要努力养成经常将工作内容存盘的习惯。

example.ex: Import your scanned images from the scanner and save as a JPG file.
example.tran: 从扫描仪导入扫描后的图像，并保存为 JPG 文件。

entry.def: If a goalkeeper saves, or saves a shot, they succeed in preventing the ball from going into the goal.

example.ex: He saved one shot when the ball hit him on the head.
example.tran: 球砸中他的脑袋，从而让他化解了一次射门。

entry.def: You can use save to introduce the only things, people, or ideas that your main statement does not apply to.

example.ex: There is almost no water at all in Mochudi save that brought up from bore holes.
example.tran: 除了从钻孔中抽上来的水外，莫丘迪几乎滴水无存。

means.word_mean: 1. (sports) the act of preventing the opposition from scoring;

sentences.sentence: "the relief pitcher got credit for a save"

means.word_mean: 1. save from ruin, destruction, or harm
2. to keep up and reserve for personal or special use;

"We pulled through most of the victims of the bomb attack"

means.word_mean: 4. spend less; buy at a reduced price
5. feather one's nest; have a nest egg;
6. make unnecessary an expenditure or effort;

sentences.sentence: "This will save you a lot of time"

means.word_mean: 9. spend sparingly, avoid the waste of;

sentences.sentence: "The less fortunate will have to economize now"
"keep my job for me while I give birth"
"keep open the possibility of a merger"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French sauver, from late Latin salvare, from Latin salvus 'safe'. The noun dates from the late 19th cent

Middle English: from Old French sauf, sauve, from Latin salvo, salva (ablative singular of salvus 'safe'), used in phrases such as salvo jure, salva innocentia 'with no violation of right or innocence'

sentences.cn: 他试图挽救他们的婚姻。
sentences.en: He's trying to save their marriage.

sentences.cn: 只有下面的两场获胜，她才能挽回败局。
sentences.en: She needs to win the next two games to save the match.

sentences.cn: 谢谢你这么做。你帮了我大忙。
sentences.en: Thanks for doing that. You saved my life (= helped me a lot) .

sentences.cn: 我不大攒得住钱。
sentences.en: I'm not very good at saving.

sentences.cn: 我正攒钱想买辆新自行车。
sentences.en: I'm saving for a new bike.

sentences.cn: 我们一直在攒钱，打算去澳大利亚。
sentences.en: We've been saving up to go to Australia.

sentences.cn: 你应该每星期存一点钱。
sentences.en: You should save a little each week.

sentences.cn: 我至今已经攒了差不多100英镑了。
sentences.en: I've saved almost £100 so far.

sentences.cn: 我收藏剧院的节目单已有多年了。
sentences.en: I've been saving theatre programmes for years.

sentences.cn: 积十张礼品券便可得到一件T恤衫。
sentences.en: If you save ten tokens you can get a T-shirt.

sentences.cn: 给我留点吃的。
sentences.en: Save some food for me.

sentences.cn: 给我留点吃的。
sentences.en: Save me some food.

sentences.cn: 为保住陷入困境中的英国航空业的 4 万份工作所作的最后一次努力
sentences.en: ...a final attempt to save 40,000 jobs in Britain's troubled aero industry...

sentences.cn: 昨晚比利时拖网渔船“幸运号”在荷兰海岸附近沉没后，仍有1人失踪，其余 3 人被救起。
sentences.en: One man was still missing last night after the Belgian trawler Lucky capsized off the Dutch coast. Three other men were saved...

sentences.cn: 大多数人都打算存钱，但月末时就会发现已一文不剩。
sentences.en: The majority of people intend to save, but find that by the end of the month there is nothing left...

sentences.cn: 蒂姆和芭芭拉正在攒钱，准备在郊区买一栋房子。
sentences.en: Tim and Barbara are now saving for a house in the suburbs...

sentences.cn: 把厨房里常用的东西放在触手可及的地方能节省做饭时间。
sentences.en: It saves time in the kitchen to have things you use a lot within reach...

sentences.cn: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。
sentences.en: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles...

sentences.cn: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。
sentences.en: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup...

sentences.cn: 边角碎料都保留下来，剪好后拼在一起做成被子。
sentences.en: Scraps of material were saved, cut up and pieced together for quilts.

sentences.cn: 扫描仪将使病人免遭风险和痛苦。
sentences.en: The scanner will save risk and pain for patients...

sentences.cn: 她希望有什么能使自己不必作决定。
sentences.en: She was hoping that something might save her from having to make a decision...

sentences.cn: 要努力养成经常将工作内容存盘的习惯。
sentences.en: Try to get into the habit of saving your work regularly...

sentences.en: Import your scanned images from the scanner and save as a JPG file.

sentences.en: He saved one shot when the ball hit him on the head.

sentences.en: There is almost no water at all in Mochudi save that brought up from bore holes.

sentences.cn: 我们坐出租车，好节省时间。
sentences.en: We'll take a cab to save time.

sentences.cn: 把厨房里常用的东西放在触手可及的地方能节省做饭时间。
sentences.en: It saves time in the kitchen to have things you use a lot within reach...

sentences.cn: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。
sentences.en: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles...

sentences.cn: 这有助于美国运输安全管理局把精力都集中到危险性更高的旅客身上，节省每个人的时间。
sentences.en: This allows the TSA to focus on travelers who are higher risk， saving time for everyone involved.

sentences.cn: 众议院正在审议这项法案，该法案预计能在五年内为美国邮政署节省约286亿美元，可帮助负担新运输工具以及其他使其得以生存的措施。
sentences.en: Legislation is moving through the House that would save USPS an estimated $28.6  billion over five years, which could help pay for new vehicles, among other survival measures.

sentences.cn: 选择间隔年一开始就把事情理顺有助于预防压力,之后还能节省开支。
sentences.en: Taking a gap year to figure things out initially can help prevent stress and save money later on.

sentences.cn: 机器人已经帮我们节省了时间、金钱和精力。
sentences.en: Robots already save us time, money and energy.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 不管是任何一位疲于应付不同保险公司五花八门保险表单的医生，还是那些绞尽脑汁想弄清一长串保险费用结算单含义的患者们，都会明白化繁为简可以节省费用的道理。
sentences.en: Any doctor who has wrestled with multiple forms from different insurers, or patients who have tried to understand their own parade of statements, know that simplification ought to save money.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 据其估计，在未来十年内，这一步举措将节省数千亿美元。
sentences.en: It estimated that step would save hundreds of billions of dollars over the next decade.

sentences.cn: 最终的立法可能会在竞争中加入一项公共保险计划，但由于保险行业和共和党批评家、强烈反对，这项计划可能也节省不了多少费用。
sentences.en: The final legislation might throw a public plan into the competition, but thanks to the fierce opposition of the insurance industry and Republican critics, it might not save much money.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 总体来看，几乎有五分之三的英国人表示他们在试图限制纸张的用量以节省开销——包括面巾纸和厨房卷纸。
sentences.en: Overall, almost three in five people say they try to limit their usage of paper – including facial tissue and kitchen roll – to save money.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 例如上周，邮政部长Pat Donahoe 宣布计划停止每周六的邮递业务，他称这一举措可为每年节省30 亿美元开支。
sentences.en: Last week, for example, (6) Postmaster General Pat Donahoe announced plans to stop mail delivery on Saturdays, a move he says could save three billion dollars annually

sentences.cn: 货币贬值时, 就无法鼓励人们储蓄.
sentences.en: When money falls in value, there is no encouragement to save.

sentences.cn: 他在储蓄以便买一幢住宅供全家居住.
sentences.en: He is saving up to buy a home for his family.

sentences.cn: 因为经常账户赤字等于储蓄减去投资, 在这些方面去寻找原因是合乎逻辑的.
sentences.en: Because the current account deficit equals saving minus investment, these are logical places to look.

sentences.cn: 在91年经济泡沫破灭后, 日本居民将其收入的15%用于储蓄.
sentences.en: When its bubble burst in 1991, Japan's households saved 15 % of their income.

sentences.cn: 在全球范围内,人们对储蓄和借贷的兴趣都远大于投资.
sentences.en: Global willingness to save and lend is running ahead of investment.

sentences.cn: 亚洲人在使用任何储蓄时应该更富有成效.
sentences.en: Asia should use all saving more efficiently and more productively.

sentences.cn: 一般认为, 储蓄对公司方面是利好消息.
sentences.en: That said, saving could be good news for companies.

sentences.en: A man who always anticipates his income can never save or become rich.

sentences.cn: 为了买房子,我们已储蓄了五年.
sentences.en: We've been saving for five years to buy a house.

sentences.en: John saved 10 cent savings stamps until he had enough to exchange for a $ 25 bond.

sentences.cn: 于是, 必须在储蓄卡里存入足够的钱以便成功还款.
sentences.en: Thus, the need to save enough money deposited in Cary for the successful repayment.

sentences.cn: 你应该为你的大学教育经费而储蓄.
sentences.en: You should save up for your college education.

sentences.cn: 如果储蓄率自此企稳, 说明未来增加的收入将用于消费而不是储蓄.
sentences.en: If savings have since stabilised , that suggests future income growth will be spent rather than saved.

sentences.cn: 有睦人购买股票是作为储蓄计划的一部分.
sentences.en: Some people buy stocks as part of a plan to save money.

sentences.cn: 他从不储蓄.
sentences.en: He has never saved.

sentences.cn: 反对储蓄的另一种论点, 说起来也实在是荒唐透顶.
sentences.en: Still another objection is made against saving. It is said to be just downright silly.

sentences.cn: 个人 、 企业和一些国家的政府保持了储蓄的习惯.
sentences.en: Individuals, companies and some governments have continued their propensity to save.

sentences.cn: 目前,比较好的方法是储蓄&清还债务(这句不太肯定啊).
sentences.en: For the moment the better part of financial valor comes through saving and paying off debts.

sentences.cn: 对利息所得税降低了当期消费的机会成本,从而刺激人民减少储蓄.
sentences.en: Taxing interest the opportunity cost of present consumption and thereby creates incentives to lower saving.

sentences.cn: 我的储蓄账户号码是什么?
sentences.en: What is my saving account number.

sentences.cn: 德国开始补贴个人养老金储蓄.
sentences.en: Germany has started to subsidise private pension saving.

sentences.cn: 要收的, 但储蓄账户不收服务费.
sentences.en: Yes, but there is no charge for a saving account.

sentences.cn: 第四点, 储蓄已经不是美德.
sentences.en: Fourth, saving is no more a virtue.

sentences.cn: 随着投资减少和储蓄增加, 经常账户赤字将开始收窄.
sentences.en: With investment down and saving up, the current account deficit will narrow.

sentences.cn: 明年, 尽管美国人期望储蓄比收入赢余多一个百分点.
sentences.en: Next year, though, Americans are expected to save more than one percent of unspent earnings.

sentences.en: This is a persistent misconception owing to a misunderstanding of what it means to save.

sentences.en: Food and medical are needed in many Africancountries to save the hungry and sick people there.
